krpano.title: Virtual Tour
krpano.action: add(nextsceneindex, get(scene[get(xml.scene)].index),1); if(nextsceneindex LT scene.count, loadscene(get(scene[get(nextsceneindex)].name), null, MERGE, BLEND(0.7)); );
set (layer[antwoord_is_goed2].visible,false); set (layer[antwoord_is_fout2].visible,false); call_scene1 () ; set (layer[eindscore].visible,true); center_vlak(); setSizeVierkant();
